comment: OR ... you can see it for what drag actually IS , which is a celebration and homage of all things feminine , giving power to those who need it ! Strong women aren't threatened by drag queens , but rather empowered by their chutzpah . HAPPY HOLIDAYS ! ! <URL>

comment: As a drag queen , myself and many others try to uplift women ! In no way do we do drag to disrespect women , go to a drag show and you ll realise how amazing it really is !
amr:
